messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard space niggas be like. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Regarding the level 5 biohazard outbreak, Remember Fire and Energy are the two primary defenses against Organic Growth.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
